S5.T1.caption: Table 1: Summary of dataset
S5.T1.table:
MNIST CIFAR10 GTSRB
Training data 60,000 50,000 39,209
Test data 10,000 10,000 12,630
Label 10 10 43
Input Size 28x28x1 32x32x3 30x30x3
references:
We implement three datasets and look into how our scheme achieves superior performance compared to state-of-the-art schemes. Our experiments are conducted with a Nvidia 3090 graphics card and 24GB memory in the PyTorch environment. MNIST, CIFAR10, and GTSRB are selected as the primary datasets.
The characteristics of the above three datasets are summarized in Table 1.
